transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji. Haan ji sir.
Executive: Pappu Pappu sir Aman bol raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji sir boliye.
Executive: Maine kaha aapka last mahine baat hua tha madam se Richa madam se.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Maine kaha Richa madam se baat hua tha last mahine.
Customer: Kis cheez ka?
Executive: TrustSeal ka baat hua tha na Richa madam se aapne bola tha Diwali ke baad karaoge aap.
Customer: Are abhi nahi kara na bhai sahab main mera baat to hua tha par karana nahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Uske liye kiya hai koi aur koi aur cheez ke liye kiya hai.
Executive: Haan sir wo buylead vagera bhi wo dekhna tha mujhe but abhi to maine abhi to main hu nahi sir aap ek kaam kariye na ek meeting karna hai aapke sath video call pe wo jo kuch corrections vagera hai aapne location vagera kari hai na to aap ek meeting fix kar lijiye to wo kar lete hain apan.
Customer: Haan to subere karenge sahab abhi main kaam se aaya hu abhi ghar pe aake ruka hu.
Executive: Aap phone kyu nahi uthate main pichle teen dinon se phone kar raha hu aapko phone hi nahi utha rahe aap mera.
Customer: Haan ji sir wo kaam me lage rehte hain na to holmination tha fir baad me dhyan nahi rehta wo kaam kaam waise hi hai na hard work ka machine vagera chalti rehti hain.
Executive: Chalo theek hai main Monday ko call karta hu utha lena aap.
Customer: Haan ji Monday ko to main kar lunga koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Theek hai abhi bhi bike chala raha tha main tab aapka call aa raha tha fir ghar aake.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo kya hai Richa madam ne bola tha mujhe ke Diwali ke baad sir ne bola hai payment karne ka.
Customer: Are isi me karao na jo bhi kuch karana hai ab Diwali bhi yahi chali gayi ab kuch hua nahi ab batao kya kare.
Customer: Ab isi me karao na aap kuch.
Executive: Monday ko apan dekh lete hain jo bhi hota hai.
Customer: Haan nahi to main isko chala hi raha hu jaise bhi chal raha hai wo main to ye dekh raha hu aapne bola tha naya service hai naya ke hisab se dekh raha hu main to.
Executive: Aap aao online Monday ko dekhte hain apan theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai isi me karao main aage kara lunga paiso ka budget nahi hai naya kaam to nikala nahi ab kya kare Diwali bhi halki ja rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm chalo theek hai main Monday connect karta hu aapko kaam hai nahi ab kya kare batao.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Paisa aayega tabhi to aage pack bhi badwaunga na ab kaam isi me karao thoda.
Customer: Iske baad abhi aap use karne hi band kar diye aapne you buylead vagera use hi nahi kar rahe ho aap bilkul bhi.
Customer: Are mobile me to aata nahi hai lead ab laptop me har samay rehta nahi hai kaam bhi karna hota batao IndiaMART suno.
Executive: Mobile me bhi aata hai ji.
Customer: Are sold out dikhata na wo aata bhi koi dikhai bhi de jata tha wo sold out dikhata.
Executive: Nahi nahi abhi aap abhi aap open karo lead main batata hu abhi aap buylead me jao waha pe location me aap India lagao recent lagao.
Customer: Dekhta hu main ruko ek minute line pe raho.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Location me India lagao.
Executive: Aur recent ka pehle recent lagao fir India lagao.
Customer: Recent ho gaya.
Executive: India lagao.
Customer: Uske baad India ho gaya.
Customer: Ab batao kaha pe lead hai.
Executive: Batao kaun si lead dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Isme to first me ye aa raha hai crystal ka Buddha statue.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Crystal ka Buddha statue aa raha hai upar hi upar.
Executive: Achcha uske baad aur niche karo.
Customer: Niche ho hi nahi raha hai ispe jo cheez aapne bataiye recent lagana uske baad India.
Executive: Scroll scroll karo scroll.
Customer: Hain.
Executive: Scroll karo.
Customer: Scroll ke baad niche aai na koi bhi lead nahi dikh raha.
Executive: Theek ek minute line pe raho aap.
Executive: Ek minute ruk jao main check karta hu.
Customer: Meri ID dekh rahe ho aap kisi aur ki.
Executive: Aapki dekh raha hu sir ek minute ruk jaiye.
Executive: Maine ek second.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: 8438579
Executive: 093
Executive: By lead India.
Executive: Pehle number ka kaha ka lead dikh raha hai sir aapko.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Pehle number pe kaha ka lead dikh raha hai.
Customer: Bengaluru Karnataka.
Executive: Uske baad.
Customer: Uske baad koi hai hi nahi.
Executive: Aur usko recent ko relevent pe click karna.
Customer: Relevent pe click karta hu to ye dikh raha hai uske baad brass Lakshmi Vishnu dikh raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Uske baad dikh raha hai Hanuman statue.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Relevent hogi na sir.
Customer: Iske baad Ganesh statue.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Iske baad Lord Ganesh Loola mini ye kuch dikh raha hai.
Executive: To kuch to relevent hogi na isme ye thodi na ki sari ki sari relevent ho.
Customer: Ab pata nahi hai isme batao marble ki kaun si hai isme lead koi bhi marble ki nahi hai inme.
Executive: Marble ki nahi hai.
Executive: Ek second marble statue marble statue Ganesh statue Hanuman ye Hanuman statue wo kaay ka hai sir marble me jo hai.
Customer: Wo marble ka hai sure nahi hai isme.
Executive: Uske baad sir ek wo wala marble ka hai iske baad Ganesh wala wo wala to kariye Hanuman Hanuman statue wo to usi ka hai na marble ka.
Customer: Wo to maine kar liya ab usse baat karke pata lagega aage to usme jo rate hai wo to bilkul ₹1000 ki de rakhi hai pata nahi marble ka mang raha hai wo kuch aur.
Executive: Theek hai aur bata raha hu ek minute line pe rahiye.
Customer: Order value usme 1000 se 3000 dikha rakha hai itne me marble ka murti koi nahi aata.
Executive: Concrete mang raha hai ye.
Executive: Achcha aapne kuch location bhi kari hui hai sir ek minute ruk jaiye main open karta hu.
Executive: Ab sir aapne pata hai kya kiya hai aap na buylead jo relevent buylead hai na unko bhi aapne not relevent mark mara hai.
Executive: Dekho marble Ram statue marble Ram statue ki lead aayi thi aapne usko not relevent mark kar diya.
Customer: Kahan kar diya kahan kahan hota hai mujhe kya pata kahan kar diya maine.
Executive: Aapne sir system se kiya hai desktop se aap tabhi to aapke paas ye lead aani aur kam ho gayi hai aap ulta kyu kar rahe ho jo aapne marble wali lead ko bhi aapne not relevent mark kar diya.
Customer: Kahan kar diya kab?
Executive: System pe feedback dene ka option aata hai aapne desktop se kiya desktop pe aap jab use kar rahe hoge na to usme delete ka option aata hai ek aapne usme ja ke.
Customer: Haan to usme main usi ko karta hu jo marble ki nahi hoti hai.
Executive: But aapne marble wali kar di na sir main bhej deta hu aapko aapne marble wali kar di hai.
Customer: Marble ki kaha bata na bhejna dikhana.
Executive: Main bhej raha hu aapko whatsapp pe aap check kar lena ek baar theek hai.
Customer: Dikhao main usme kuch kami hogi usme kuch na kuch to locha hoga tabhi.
Executive: Main bhej raha hu baki aap mujhe Monday ko video call pe connect kar lena ek baar marble nahi hoga ya dust marble hoga kuch bhi hoga wo.
Executive: Main bhej deta hu aapko aap check kar lena theek hai baki Monday ka aap mujhe time batao kis time video call pe connect karna hai.
Customer: Chalo ye to ek chali gayi hogi galti se ya to fir nahi to aisa to kuch nahi batao dalo aap.
Executive: Sir bahut sari lead aapne dali hai theek hai main bhej ke aapko bhej raha hu whatsapp check kar lena aap thodi der me.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know about marble leads.

- Customer says leads not showing in mobile.

- Customer says Diwali was not good for business.



Resolution:

- Executive informed customer about buyleads process.

- Executive will send details on WhatsApp.

- Executive asked to connect on video call Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will send details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, marble, statue, diwali, payment
